item.title: California Prop 65
item.description: Todd Pipe & Supply is committed to complying with all applicable laws and regulations pertaining to the products we distribute. The California Safe Drinking Water and Toxic Enforcement Act of 1986, also known as Proposition 65, requires clear and reasonable warnings for products that can expose individuals to any one of the 900-plus chemicals on the Proposition 65 list. New Proposition 65 warning regulations became fully effective on August 30, 2018.
